Development environment

02 Aug 2012

Shot of my development environment. Asus eepc, ubuntu netbook edition 10, sdcard mount for tmp folder, Dropbox on USB stick, ruby on rails and a tranparent terminal screen to recreate that dual screen effect. Talk about cost effective :)
